name: Tower of the Dice God
description:
Controls:

  • Movement: Arrow Keys/WASD
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • Open/Close Shop: Tab

Enter the titular tower, and blast your way through waves of dice demons in the pursuit of fortune and glory!

You play as a die,  who is rerolled every 10 seconds to one of their six faces, each one with their own special properties!

Upgrade your many-sided hero at the shop as you climb ever deeper into the tower!
